info.name: Apache Detection
author: philippedelteil
info.description: Some Apache servers have the version on the response header. The OpenSSL version can be also obtained

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: paps.sante.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Accept-Ranges: bytes
Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1
Date: Sun, 17 Oct 2021 03:28:49 GMT
Etag: "54-541e4bbe3b829-gzip"
Last-Modified: Tue, 22 Nov 2016 14:39:04 GMT
Referrer-Policy: strict-origin
Server: Apache
Set-Cookie: BIGipServerpool-ars.cegedim.cloud-HTTP=834951434.49431.0000; path=/; Httponly; Secure
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains
Vary: Accept-Encoding
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: sameorigin
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block

<html><font color='white'>mtsfp-vm-sante-ars-front1.mtsfp.priv default vhost</html>

info.name: Header Based Generic OOB Interaction
author: pdteam
info.description: The remote server fetched a spoofed URL from the request headers.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: paps.sante.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Cache-Control: no-transform
Cf-Connecting_ip: spoofed.c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh
Client-Ip: spoofed.c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh
Contact: root@c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh
Forwarded: for=spoofed.c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh;by=spoofed.c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh;host=spoofed.c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh
From: root@c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh
Referer: http://c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh/ref
True-Client-Ip: spoofed.c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh
X-Client-Ip: spoofed.c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh
X-Forwarded-For: spoofed.c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh
X-Forwarded-Host: spoofed.c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh
X-Forwarded-Server: spoofed.c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh
X-HTTP-Host-Override: spoofed.c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh
X-Host: spoofed.c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh
X-Originating-Ip: spoofed.c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh
X-Real-Ip: spoofed.c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh
X-Wap-Profile: http://c5lpgsngtmqvj7nktaogcfi3o7oyyyyy6.interact.sh/wap.xml
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Accept-Ranges: bytes
Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1
Date: Sun, 17 Oct 2021 03:28:54 GMT
Etag: "54-541e4bbe3b829-gzip"
Last-Modified: Tue, 22 Nov 2016 14:39:04 GMT
Referrer-Policy: strict-origin
Server: Apache
Set-Cookie: BIGipServerpool-ars.cegedim.cloud-HTTP=834951434.49431.0000; path=/; Httponly; Secure
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains
Vary: Accept-Encoding
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: sameorigin
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block

<html><font color='white'>mtsfp-vm-sante-ars-front1.mtsfp.priv default vhost</html>
